name: Jonas The Wizard and The Broken Dungeon
name_original: Jonas The Wizard and The Broken Dungeon
description:
Use and avoid early build bugs to reach end of dungeon. Virtual Jonas (the protagonist and wizard) will be grateful! Feel yourself cool wizard with fireball and teleport.

My submission to Wowie 2.0.

I think it is fun small game. If you like it become my friend! Follow me here or add me on FB: https://www.facebook.com/bohdanzoshchenko

This game is in development and should become roguelike.
